columns.text:
Welcome to Villa Dakoronia Santorini

‘Villa Dakoronia’ was recently renovated from an old theran villa and is situated on the top of the cliff ridge along the traditional caldera path between Fira and Firostefani, facing the spectacular Caldera view.

Villa Dakoronia encompasses all special features composing luxury living in a privileged spot of the island. On the caldera path connecting Fira and Firostefani, this luxurious villa offers a truly wonderful holiday experience.

Aesthetically supreme and lavishly decorated, designed with comfort and practicality in mind, Villa Dakoronia guarantees the optimal lodging for everyone seeking privacy, serenity and incomparable views to the infinite blue of the Aegean Sea, the fierce rock formations of the caldera and the emblematic volcano.

items.title: Villa Dakoronia
items.description: Being placed at the top of the cliff and with an excellent view to Caldera, the renovated villa consists of two bedrooms with queen size beds and two bathrooms with bath tubs.
items.excerpt: Being placed at the top of the cliff and with an excellent view to Caldera, the renovated villa consists of two bedrooms with queen size beds and two bathrooms with bath tubs.
items.amenities:
Key feature & selling points

  • 2 suites and 4 double studios with individually designed rooms
  • Tailor made services prior to arrival, such as, online check in, room scent and temperature, in house music and movies, candle light and rose petals decoration, satin beds sheets and more…
  • Especially for honeymooners: room decoration with candles and one bottle of champagne
  • Audio visual includes: free Wi-Fi internet access, LCD TV satellite channels, DVD / CD / radio / Mp3 player
  • Complimentary private parking is available on site

items.seo_title: Villa Dakoronia | Rooms | Villa Dakoronia Santorini
items.seo_description: Villa Dakoronia is a 90 sq.m duplex with 2 bedrooms, a spacious living room & fully-equipped kitchen.. Outdoor pool and terrace. Sea views. Book today!

items.title: Art Hotel Santorini
items.description:
Welcome to Art Hotel Santorini

Art Hotel in Pyrgos village in Santorini adopted Vincent Van Gogh words in order to paint the dream hotel: “I dream my painting and then I paint my dream”. For adults and gay oriented, Art hotel is design for those who love elegance, luxury, style and they are passionate for discovering the art.

Art Hotel has elegant minimalistic all-white suites highlighting the artworks within each room. At the hotel you will also find a reception that is available 24 hours a day.

As for the children? You are most encouraged to leave them back home for a few days and feel the carefree breeze of Santorini with nothing getting in the way!

The elegant buildings stretch round the refreshing central swimming pool, promoting a private environment where the guests can mingle and get to know one another in the most wonderful atmosphere while on vacations. Socialising is part of the decor and those who are interested in meeting new and fascinating people are going to love Art Hotel.
items.excerpt: Aqua Vista Hotel's Art Hotel Santorini, has elegant all-white suites, each one highlighting artworks. Bespoke services of the finest quality are available.

items.title: Dreams Luxury Suites
items.description:
Welcome to Dreams Luxury Suites

Our most luxurious offer, the Dreams Luxury Suites, are four suites in beautifully renovated cave houses, each with a unique personality combining courteous and warm service with authentic tradition. Three of the suites have a private pool and jacuzzi, and the Nefeli suite has just a jacuzzi.

4 Suites Dreams luxury suites have stayed true to the original style of the island and represent an inimitable sample of traditional Greek archi-tecture. These original houses were built more than 100 years ago, and restored in 2008.

Dreams Luxury Suites is the place where style, luxury, and perfection meet a world of beauty and tradition. The offered accommodation options represent a new concept of sanctuary with a unique personality. 

The Suites were designed for the distinctive guest who is able to appreciate a singular kind of comfort, class, space and tranquility.

These original houses, more than 100 years old,  have been restored and they incorporate modern amenities, while preserving the traditional architecture.
items.excerpt: Our most luxurious offer, the Dreams Luxury Suites, are four suites in beautifully renovated cave houses, each with a unique personality combining courteous and warm service with authentic tradition.

amenities.item: All suites with magnificent view to the Aegean sea, volcano and sunset
Especially for honeymooners: room decoration with candles and rose petals, one bottle of champagne upon arrival.

SEO.title: Villa Dakoronia Santorini | Aqua Vista Hotels
SEO.description: Aqua Vista Hotel's Villa Dakaronia is a luxury villa in Santorini's charming capital of Fira. It offers privacy, serenity and incomparable views.
